snippet.title: [Portal Beta] Portal 2006 Trailer Recreation
snippet.description:
http://www.moddb.com/mods/portal-project-beta1

A recreation of the original Portal trailer from 2006 using assets from Project Beta 2016.

The only thing I redid was the gameplay, just so you know.

Somebody please put this on the ModDB page lol.
